title: Suspect arrested in shooting that injured 1-year-old
content:
OMAHA, Neb. (WOWT) -- Omaha police have arrested a suspect believed to be responsible for a shooting that injured a 1-year-old Wednesday.
Officers were called to a residential area near 34th and Forest Lawn Ave. just after 5 p.m. Police said 1-year-old Da'Qontez Mayfield was transported to Nebraska Medical Center due to an apparent gunshot wound. Mayfield's injuries are not considered life threatening.
Officers on scene interviewed several witnesses. Police arrested 18-year-old La'Shannon Bland for 2nd degree assault, weapon use to commit a felony, possession of stolen firearm, evidence tampering and unlawful discharge of a firearm within city limits.
La'Shannon Bland admitted to officers to the discharge of the firearm.
